channel.title: Side dish on Tender Meat Love
channel.description: Recent content in Side dish on Tender Meat Love

item.title: Yorkshire Pudding
item.description: Preheat oven to 400F Mix flour and salt together Make a well in the flour, add milk and whisk Add eggs into batter and water and mix until batter is frothy Set aside for an hour Put drippings into 9x12 baking dish and put in oven, remove when drippings are sizzling Once drippings are sizzling, pour batter into pan and bake for 30 minutes

item.title: Charred carrots
item.description: Preheat oven to 425 degrees (convection roast) Peel carrots, cut in half, then cut in half length-wise Toss in olive oil, thyme, salt, and pepper Pre-heat pan in oven for 5 minutes Cook in oven for 10 minutes Flip carrots Cook another 8-10 minutes Drizzle with a very small amount of honey and chipotle pepper, toss to coat and serve

item.title: Sauted Apples
item.description: Heat non-stick pan over medium-high heat Use an apple slicer to cut your apple and core it into wedges (peel skin if you don’t want it) Add butter to pan and add apples Add water and sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon Cook 5-10 minutes until apples are soft and browned

item.title: Garlic mashed fingerling potatoes
item.description: Wash potatoes and smash the garlic Put them into a sauce pot with enough water to cover Bring to a boil, then cook covered for ~15 minutes until tender Mash and add buttermilk, and season to taste with salt and pepper
